# Get summoner data

```{r}
api_host <- "euw1.api.riotgames.com"
summoner_name <- "Kewizard FR"
# summoner_name <- "Cyrlop"
url <- URLencode(sprintf("https://%s/lol/summoner/v4/summoners/by-name/%s", api_host, summoner_name))
query <- GET(url, add_headers(`X-Riot-Token` = api_key))
query_data <- content(query)
str(query_data)
```
